name: Americano
description: Organic espresso poured over hot filtered water.

name: Cappuccino
description: organic espresso combined with silky steamed milk, finished with a dense layer of foam and a dusting of chocolate powder

name: Espresso

description: Organic espresso combined with silky steamed milk and finished with a light layer of foam.

name: Filter Coffee
description: Organic filter coffee is a hand-crafted blend of arabica coffees. Medium roasted to create a smooth and balanced flavour

name: Breakfast Tea
description: Rich, refreshing and reviving full-bodied classic tea.

name: Breakfast Tea
description: Ceylon black-leaf tea is infused with delicate organic Bergamot flavour.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Matcha green tea blended with steamed milk.

name: Hot Chocolate
